formattedAddress: 976A Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 976A Lexington Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: Very quaint and cozy cafe to spend a bit of time on a quiet afternoon. Their iced honey oat latte was absolutely DELICIOUS, and their lemon cake was also fresh and moist. They have several specialty lattes on the menu that look really good. I popped in a little after midday on a Sunday, and there were only two other people inside working quietly which was great. The staff was super friendly and attentive as well.

text.text: Very quaint and cozy cafe to spend a bit of time on a quiet afternoon. Their iced honey oat latte was absolutely DELICIOUS, and their lemon cake was also fresh and moist. They have several specialty lattes on the menu that look really good. I popped in a little after midday on a Sunday, and there were only two other people inside working quietly which was great. The staff was super friendly and attentive as well.

originalText.text: This cafe offers delicious lattes as well as classy desserts as well as tasty sandwiches. And in the afternoon you can also enjoy a glass of wine.

text.text: This cafe offers delicious lattes as well as classy desserts as well as tasty sandwiches. And in the afternoon you can also enjoy a glass of wine.

originalText.text: Hands-down the best service I’ve ever received in NY. The girls at the counter were so charming and helpful, and made me the most delicious avocado toast. I can’t wait to return and try their other food options! Pastries looked amazing too.

text.text: Hands-down the best service I’ve ever received in NY. The girls at the counter were so charming and helpful, and made me the most delicious avocado toast. I can’t wait to return and try their other food options! Pastries looked amazing too.

originalText.text: Came in here during a quick school break and got the Tuscan artichoke salad and an iced matcha latte. They had the most delicious oat milk and all organic matcha. Salad was amazing, added avocado and sat for a nice hour or so. Super comfortable spot on the upper east side! Will return!

text.text: Came in here during a quick school break and got the Tuscan artichoke salad and an iced matcha latte. They had the most delicious oat milk and all organic matcha. Salad was amazing, added avocado and sat for a nice hour or so. Super comfortable spot on the upper east side! Will return!

originalText.text:
I recently visited this coffee shop, and it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm and inviting atmosphere. The aroma of freshly brewed coffee filled the air, creating an irresistible temptation.

The baristas here are true coffee artisans, and their passion for their craft is evident in every cup they serve. I tried their signature latte, and it was a masterpiece of flavor and presentation. The coffee was rich and perfectly balanced, and the latte art on top was a delightful touch.

The service was exceptional. The staff was friendly, attentive, and knowledgeable, making me feel like a valued customer. The cozy seating and ambient music made it a great place to unwind, work, or catch up with friends.

I also appreciated the variety of options on the menu, catering to both coffee purists and those looking for unique specialty drinks. Whether you prefer a classic espresso or a creative concoction, this coffee shop has something for everyone.

Overall, this coffee shop is a gem in the city. It offers top-notch coffee, a welcoming atmosphere, and exceptional service. I can't wait to return and explore more of their offerings. If you're a coffee lover like me, do yourself a favor and visit this place. It's definitely deserving of a solid 5-star rating!
